---
title: "Initiate Batch Call"
api: "POST /initiateBatchCall"
description: "Initiate calls to multiple contacts in a single request"
---

## Overview

Trigger outbound calls to multiple contacts simultaneously. Maximum 1000 contacts per request.

---

## Headers

<ParamField header="Content-Type" type="string" required>
  application/json
</ParamField>

<ParamField header="Authorization" type="string" required>
  Bearer token for authentication
  
  **Options:**
  - Regular JWT token: `Bearer <JWT_TOKEN>` (from login response)
  - Static batch token: `Bearer <BATCH_STATIC_TOKEN>` (never expires - contact support)
</ParamField>

<ParamField header="Cookie" type="string">
  Alternative authentication via cookie: `token=<JWT_TOKEN>`
  
  Use this if not using Authorization header
</ParamField>

<ParamField header="Origin" type="string" required>
  Origin of the request (must be whitelisted)
</ParamField>

<ParamField header="User-Agent" type="string">
  Browser or client user agent
</ParamField>

---

##  Authentication

<Note>
  **Static Batch Token** (recommended for integrations): Never expires, ideal for automated systems. Contact support to obtain your static token.
</Note>

---

##  Request Body

<ParamField body="campaignId" type="string" required>
  Campaign ID to associate all calls with
  ```
  b885b212-d3bb-482f-a29d-508d2a8929ac
  ```
</ParamField>

<ParamField body="notificationWebhookUrl" type="string">
  Optional webhook URL for call status notifications
  ```
  https://overindulgently-unbreezy-colleen.ngrok-free.dev/getCallbackdata
  ```
</ParamField>

<ParamField body="users" type="array" required>
  Array of user objects (max 1000)
  ```json
  [
    {
      "userName": "Faiz",
      "userPhoneNumber": "919625147093",
      "metaData": {
        "due_amount": "4500",
        "due_amount_half": "2250",
        "due_date": "2025-09-03",
        "allocation_month": "2025-09-01",
        "company_name": "H-D-B financial services",
        "loan_id": "1234",
        "company_id": "23332000",
        "communication_level": "applicant",
        "product_description": "two wheeler"
      }
    }
  ]
  ```
</ParamField>

---

## Response

### Success Response (200 OK):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Batch call initiated successfully",
  "data": {
    "total_users": 1,
    "calls_initiated": 1,
    "calls_failed": 0,
    "batch_id": "batch_xyz789",
    "calls": [
      {
        "call_uuid": "call-uuid-001",
        "userName": "Faiz",
        "userPhoneNumber": "919625147093",
        "status": "initiated"
      }
    ]
  }
}
```

---

## Code Examples

### cURL:
```bash
curl -X POST "https://seamless-sandbox-dev-cm.oriserve.com/initiateBatchCall" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "campaignId": "b885b212-d3bb-482f-a29d-508d2a8929ac",
    "notificationWebhookUrl": "https://overindulgently-unbreezy-colleen.ngrok-free.dev/getCallbackdata",
    "users": [
      {
        "userName": "Faiz",
        "userPhoneNumber": "919625147093",
        "metaData": {
          "due_amount": "4500",
          "due_amount_half": "2250",
          "due_date": "2025-09-03",
          "allocation_month": "2025-09-01",
          "company_name": "H-D-B financial services",
          "loan_id": "1234",
          "company_id": "23332000",
          "communication_level": "applicant",
          "product_description": "two wheeler"
        }
      }
    ]
  }'
```

### JavaScript:
```javascript
const axios = require('axios');

async function initiateBatchCall(campaignId, users, notificationWebhookUrl = null) {
  const payload = {
    campaignId: campaignId,
    users: users
  };
  
  if (notificationWebhookUrl) {
    payload.notificationWebhookUrl = notificationWebhookUrl;
  }
  
  const response = await axios.post(
    'https://seamless-sandbox-dev-cm.oriserve.com/initiateBatchCall',
    payload
  );
  
  console.log(`âœ… ${response.data.data.calls_initiated} calls initiated`);
  return response.data.data;
}

// Example
const users = [
  {
    userName: "Faiz",
    userPhoneNumber: "919625147093",
    metaData: {
      "due_amount": "4500",
      "due_amount_half": "2250",
      "due_date": "2025-09-03",
      "allocation_month": "2025-09-01",
      "company_name": "H-D-B financial services",
      "loan_id": "1234",
      "company_id": "23332000",
      "communication_level": "applicant",
      "product_description": "two wheeler"
    }
  }
];

initiateBatchCall(
  'b885b212-d3bb-482f-a29d-508d2a8929ac', 
  users,
  'https://overindulgently-unbreezy-colleen.ngrok-free.dev/getCallbackdata'
);
```
